text:
@RealJamesWoods So called “Tin foil hat wearers” who often turn out to have been correct, say #COVID19 was made as part of the Chimera Project, currently under moratorium in the USA, so they outsourced the job to the Chinese.

https://t.co/m7uSYhFzcp
